#### Installing the Informatica Cloud Secure Agent


1. Log into Informatica Cloud using the username required and password required.
2. Select **Configure > Runtime Environments**.  
   
 ![](0.png)
3. Click **Download Secure Agent**.
4. Select the platform for the Secure Agent then click **Download**.
5. Install the Secure Agent after the download has completed.Ã‚


#### Connecting to Informatica Cloud


Follow the steps in this article to connect to Informatica Cloud data in Domo.


1. Log into Informatica Cloud using the username required and password required.
2. Select **Configure > Connections**.
3. Click **New**.  
 This opens the **New Connection** dialog.
4. Fill in the required fields, making sure to select **Domo(Domo)** for the **Type**.  
   
 ![informatica_new1.png](informatica_new1.png)
5. Click **Test** to ensure the credentials are valid.
6. Click **OK** to save.
7. Select **Task Wizards > Data Synchronization**.
8. Click **New**.  
   
 ![](2.png)
9. In the **Definition** tab of the Data Synchronization Task Wizard, fill in the **Task Name**, **Description**, and **Task Operation**. (Domo only support the **Insert** operation for the task operation.)  
   
 ![](3.png)
10. Click **Next**.
11. In the **Source** tab of the Data Synchronization Task Wizard, enter information as follows:
12. 1. For **Connection**, select the connection you created in step 4.
	2. For **Source Type**, select **Single**.
	3. For **Source Object**, select the datasets from the available datasets.  
	   
	 After you select a dataset, a preview of the dataset appears.  
	   
	 ![](4.png)
13. Click **Next**.
14. Navigate to the **Target** tab of the Data Synchronization Task Wizard.  
   
 ![](5.png)
15. In the **Target** tab, enter information as follows:


	1. For **Connection**, select the previously created connection from step 4 or create a new connection.
	2. For **Target Object**, do one of the following:
	
	
		1. Create a new target object in the Domo environment by providing the target object name and selecting the target fields, then click **OK**.  
		 This creates a new DataSet in Domo.  
		   
		 ![](6.png)
		2. Select an existing target object.
16. Click **Next**.
17. In the **Data Filters** tab of the Data Synchronization Task Wizard, select the row limit you want to process.
18. Click **Next**.
19. In the **Field Mapping** tab of the Data Synchronization Task Wizard, map the primary fields of the source object to the target object.  
   
 ![informatica_new6.png](informatica_new6.png)
20. Click **Next**.
21. Click **Save** **and Run**.  
   
 ![](8.png)
22. Click **OK** at the prompt.
23. Navigate to **Monitor > Activity Log** to check the "Status" and "Success Rows" of the Data Synchronization Task.
